title: The Count of Amboise, or, The generous lover. Part I a novel / written originally in French by Madam ... and rendered into English by P.B., gent ...
author: Bernard, Catherine, 1662-1712.
publisher: Printed for R. Bentley and M. Magnes ...
notes: Attributed to Bernard by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
